section.title: NetBpm Screenshots
section.p: Here you' ll find some screenshots of the NetBpm webinterface.

p.strong: Click on the images to get a larger version of them.

img.alt: The list of the processes and tasks of a special user

p.em: The list of the processes and tasks of a special user

img.alt: The start screen of a new process

p.em: The start screen of a new process

img.alt: A history of a process with all process steps and the history of changes of the attribute

p.em: A history of a process with all process steps and the history of changes of the attribute
